revised_title: A Case Study of Cystic Abdominal Swelling and Peritonitis
tldr: This article presents a case study of a woman who experienced severe abdominal pain and swelling due to a large quantity of fluid-filled cysts in her peritoneum. The cysts were filled with various colored liquids and were non-communicating with the abdominal cavity. The woman eventually passed away after two years and nine months of suffering. The case study provides insights into the pathology and treatment of such conditions.
